metadata.title: CVE-2021-0920 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In unix_scm_to_skb of af_unix.c, there is a possible use after free bug dueto a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege withSystem execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-196926917References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
